mapper.select: select * from guest_wishedu order by brdno desc
mapper.insert: insert into guest_wishedu( brduserid, brdsubject, brdcontext, brdfilepath, brdcount, brdadddate) values(#{brduserid}, #{brdsubject}, #{brdcontext}, #{brdfilepath}, 0, date_format(now(), '%Y/%m/%d'))
